segments.text: I see the water from the sink has already created a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just spreading wider and wider, and the woman doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, trying to get as many cookies as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, waiting for her turn to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over any second now, and that could be really dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying that plate like nothing else is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and peaceful, it's almost ironic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children don't get into trouble for taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching his limits, both literally and figuratively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really do something about that overflowing sink before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
